plot: Marge gets a job at an upscale cannabis dispensary leading Homer to open a competing business that replicates the scuzzy days of scoring weed from an old-school pot connection.

Marge begins working at an upscale cannabis store, she gets into unwanted competition with Homer who is selling pot illegally in the back room at Moe's. Determined not to lose her job, Marge begins to throw Homer under the bus and his illegal business is shut down. Homer and Marge make up at the cannabis party hosted by Drederick Tatum.—dawsonpersi
